title: Lulu's special walking animation
body:
Previously, before the Star Guardian update(I think), Lulu had this second walking animation when she got to a certain movement speed without whimsy, where she would hold her staff out to the side while running instead of in front of her. It was one of my favorite animations while I played Lulu, and I'm certain that it wasn't intentional. I'm sure it's not at all a priority but maybe someone at Riot could take a look for me? Thanks for your time :)

Ok, just tested it in game, the animation is there when I get speed boosted by anything that's not whimsy, but before, mobility boots or swiftness boots would cause the animation to stay permanently.

replies.body: This has been a common known bug for a long time. Even in the patch notes, they said they fixed it twice, but no change. I submitted a bug report myself, but...

I noticed many reports have been submitted, but I guessed all I could do was make another post. We just have to keep trying... 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hi there! 

A fellow QA friend (Riot LoveStrut) help me poke around a bit and it  looks like there was an animation before that played only when Lulu had boots, but now we made it so that animation only plays during her Run_HASTE. He's going to talk to an animator on his team and see what's intended and what needs to be changed. It isn't something you'll see next patch, but something we're actively working on! :)
